original_text: My son, beware of anything beyond these. Of making many books there is no end, and much study is a weariness of the flesh.
korean_text: 내 아들아 또 이것들로부터 경계를 받으라 많은 책들을 짓는 것은 끝이 없고 많이 공부하는 것은 몸을 피곤하게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: Of making many books there is no end,
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 책을 만드는 것은 끝이 없고,

sentences.original_text: much study is a weariness of the flesh.
